meanings.sent1: She hectographed the worksheet for the students.
meanings.sent2: The teacher hectographed the test papers for the class.
meanings.sent3: The office was hectographed with flyers for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were hectographed onto paper, spreading like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the hectographed ink filled the room, bringing back memories of school.
